nodes.text: The 11th Flight was a flight group of Confederate Navy Vulture-class droid starfighters in the service of the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars.

The Confederate Navy's 11th Flight was comprised of mottled gray and blue Vulture-class battle droids. On the ground, the droids were not very maneuverable, but rerouting power from targeting systems to shields and weapons made the 11th Flight formidable when grounded. Despite this, the 11th had the highest-rated maneuverability during flight—along with the Vulture droids of the 103rd Flight Elite—higher even than the droid starfighters of the 11th Flight Elite.
The 11th Flight of droid starfighters fought during the Clone Wars for the Confederacy of Independent Systems.
11th Flight was represented with a miniature in the initial release of the Star Wars PocketModel TCG.
